Metadata.title: Home
Metadata.description: Klowhub is a social network for no-code developers

Auth.heroText: Explore, learn, teach, and connect. Create your account on Klowhub and access a world of possibilities.

form.helpPassword: Must contain at least 1 number, 1 uppercase letter, and be at least 6 characters long.
form.helpFullName: This is how you will be identified on the platform

registerSuccess.title: Last step:
registerSuccess.description: Please check your email to confirm your account. If you don't receive an email, check your spam folder.

form.receiveSubscription: I want to receive news and tips from the platform

fullname.minLength: Full name must be at least 3 characters long

username.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long

password.invalid: Password must be at least 8 characters long, no more than 50 characters, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
